==German== ===Etymology=== {{compound|de|wo|her}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/voˈheːɐ̯/}} ===Adverb=== {{de-adv}} # [[where]] [[from]], [[whence]] #: {{ux|de|'''Woher''' kommt ihr? (informal, plural)|'''Where''' do you come '''from'''?|inline=1}} # [[how]] ({{n-g|not the general meaning of "in which way", but meaning "from which source" or "from where" exactly}}) #: {{ux|de|'''Woher''' soll ich das wissen?|'''How''' should I know?|inline=1}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|wohin}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|daher}} * {{l|de|dorther}} * {{l|de|hierher}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:German interrogative adverbs]] ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/ˈvoːɐ/}} ===Adjective=== {{head|hrx|adjective|comparative|wohrer|superlative|woherst}} # [[true]] # [[genuine]] # [[real]] ====Derived terms==== * {{l|hrx|Woherheet}}, {{l|hrx|Woherheit}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary]
